if you’re reading this, it probably means i’m dead. first things first, from the bottom of my heart i’m so fucking sorry it had to end this way, i hope you guys don’t hate me...i know you guys will resent me at the very least and i honestly can’t blame you. i really think there’s nothing in this letter that will make you feel better about this whole situation but the least i can do is explain my thought process, and maybe let y’all know it’s not what you guys think it’s about. i’m probably gonna fuck up yours guys’ lives, but please know i’m finally getting my rest. i feel so terrible knowing it’ll be at the cost of your guys mental health and i’ll essentially be robbing you of all future happiness. just know it’s literally none of your guys fault and i can say that with 100 confidence. no matter our relationship, i truly appreciate all of you for being in my life. there’s nothing you could’ve done different for me to not kill myself, and it sounds terrible even writing that but i mean it the way that i’ve always felt like my suicide was inevitable. i’ve always felt that the life cycle of work, eat, sleep w occasional pleasures was dumb asf and in my biased opinion one of the ways to escape that meaningless cycle is to not live at all. and you might wonder why not just live the already short life and enjoy what time i have left in this world with those i cherish and love. well. my brain is fucked up and it tells me that it’s not really worth all the effort. fucked up i know, because you guys ARE worth that effort to live my best life, and if i’m being honest family and friends was the only reason i even lived this long in the first place. but once i detach myself from these human feelings, and see life for what it really is, i see the logic in my thinking which you might say is just my depression is talking, which i’m sure it is in a way. but i’m sure you guys can see where i’m coming from. also unfortunately i don’t believe there is anything after death either, just eternal nothingness, which honestly doesn’t sound too bad but it truly does suck because this was my one and only shot of living life and somehow i’ve repeatedly picked the short end of the stick. and i understand that once i kill myself that all my memories, my personality, and everything that makes me, me, will be gone forever. but who wants to be remembered forever? i really did enjoy all my good moments with you guys, and it breaks my heart that i won’t be able to create more memories with y’all. i wish i had more time to really appreciate what i do have in life. but something deep in the very essence of my soul tells me i should give up on my hopes and dreams and stop giving into this depressing meaningless cycle. i tried to fight this feeling at first but i eventually learned that this is who i truly am. i will always be this selfish, lazy, annoying, fucked up person at heart, and it’s only so obvious when it’s pushing me to suicide. can’t you see that the fact that i’m even putting the debt of suicide on your shoulders, that i’m not someone who should be loved and cherished? i am a terrible person and now i’m sure you can see why. im not mad at anyone. i’m only mad at this world, i hate it for making me exist. i hate that i’m this person. i hate that i deal with these thoughts. i guess i could say that i’m also angry at myself. i’m angry for letting it get this way, i’m angry that i’ve been helped so many times only for me to fall down again due to my own stupidity. i’m angry that i let these thoughts override myself. i’m just always so full of this inescapable hatred, i think this is who i am. and honestly at this point i don’t want to try anymore, i’m tired of it all. even just existing to me is exhausting. there is so many things wrong with me mentally, that if any of you truly knew who i was, you would despise me. like the fact that i had to have conversations with multiple people like family & friends, knowing that one day i would stain your minds with my suicide. it’s such a heavy burden to carry and maybe that’s why i feel like i couldn’t talk to anyone about it, because you wouldn’t be able to relate to this feeling of existential isolation. i feel so detached from everyone with these thoughts. how could you truly understand the position i’m in. even with this novel of my thoughts, i still couldn’t expect you to understand. because sometimes these thoughts and feelings can’t be translated, it almost feels abstract. sometimes even i have a hard time examining these thoughts and understanding why i was the one doomed to feel this way. but it’s life, and life is unfair. it really fucking is. i want to grow old with y’all, but growing old is something i never want. it’s such a predicament to be in. no one understands this feeling, not even me. i feel lost in these emotions, i feel like i’m drowning in these emotions. i can’t wait for the suffering to end, and that’s why i want you to understand where i’m coming from. i’m not killing myself for no reason, i’m killing myself to free myself of this pain and suffering even if that means freeing myself of everything that is dear to me. the crazy thing is, i couldn’t give less fucks about my own life, but i want to see you guys prosper and succeed, something that i could never do. it’s ironic to me that i wish for nothing but the best for yall, yet i’m about to deliver nothing but the worst. something no person should have to go through. it’s not like i can expect you guys to forgive me or even accept my apology, because no amount of i’m sorry will ever fix this. even tho i’m like 99% sure there is no after life, i pray to the universe that there’s something that allows us to be together after this physical life. in a way there is; the energy that created me and you, and made me who i am and made you who you are, will return back to the universe and continue to persist until the very heat death of the universe and eventual tear in space time from the infinite expansion of the universe itself. for just a brief moment, the universe got to experience itself through me, and hated it so much it decided to go back to its neutral state. i’m sorry in my final moments i couldn’t even muster the courage to reach out and talk about my feelings to any of you. my heart feels so heavy because there’s so much i want to say, i want to cry in your shoulders and for you to tell me everything will be alright but i know deep down, everything won’t be alright. you guys don’t deserve this, you don’t deserve to get your lives shattered, you guys don’t deserve any of the bad things that have happened in your life. i don’t deserve y’all. and that’s why i straight up hate life, it’s so bullshit. there’s so much i want to say individually to you guys, but in a way i feel that’ll make everything worse. in a way i’m trying to push you guys away so this isn’t so difficult for me. i’m trying to detach myself from these feelings so that i stop procrastinating my death.#Suicidal_intention

I've been so unhappy for such a long time now. I just want to die, now. I think my dog Oliver dying in late February was just the breaking point- the straw on the camel's back. It wasn't always this way. When I think back to my childhood. I remember happy times. Genuine, innocent smiles, and unbreakable positivity. Things weren't perfect, though. I remember being bullied by my older siblings, and later by other children. Since I've always been sensitive, both to other people's feelings as well as my own, this hurt me terribly, and I have never forgiven either of the siblings responsible. I had such a sense of pride, as well. I don't know where it came from, but it was very strong. Since I was a smart kid, I presumed I was better than everyone else my age. I didn't treat them well, and it was a huge error in the long run. Though I had a few friends early on, those that weren't chased off by my nonsense and my sister's attention-seeking antics moved away or else found other people to befriend. I was alone. It's a feeling I know all too well now, to the point where being around others often makes me uncomfortable. My mother was, and is, a drug addict. Slowly she transformed from the person I loved the most, to filth I refuse to even acknowledge as family. I met Steven in third grade. We became best friends for a time, perhaps only two and a half years, until he moved away, but to this day I consider him to be the best friend I ever had. I remember happy times with him. I also remember awful times. Being pelted with rocks, getting beaten up, endless namecalling and mocking. Once he moved, I had no social contacts my age. I started to become somewhat neurotic, probably a sign of my at-the-time undiagnosed autism. Other people my age treated me terribly, and I was frequently mocked and bullied. Things only improved marginally in high school. While the physical attacks had stopped, because I had taken MMA and won a fight, I was still greatly disliked, at least by some, who made it very apparent. I was even spit on from an upper story at school, on Valentine's day. Here, too, were moments of happiness though. I enjoyed learning, and took up Japanese as a second language. I went to little Tokyo in LA many times with my favorite teachers and a small group of weeb students. Even then, though, it wasn't worth it. I was so alone, and hurt. All I wanted was a friend. I never got one. I nearly chose to end my life then, but I made a promise, to stick around and live for my father, the person I love and cherish the most. When I graduated, I did it with honors. Imagine my surprise when, accepting my award, I received a standing ovation from the students... I wasn't hated by them after all, but I was so untrusting of everyone that I never allowed myself to see that. This realization hurts to this day. I was alone and hurting for so long, and it was my fault, completely. In college, things never improved. I couldn't handle the work load, for one. A lifetime of being praised for the minimum excellent work that I did made me lazy. Then came one of the hardest hits. I had to move. The housing trap we lived in was becoming too expensive to stay after 20 years. I was forced to drop out of college, and the movers we chose ended up stealing or destroying most of our things. I lost so much. Despite that being nearly two years ago, it still hurts, like a wound. I am extremely sentimental, and losing these simple belongings hurt me at my core. Shortly after arriving at my destination, in NC, I had to be hospitalized for severe suicidal ideation. I hated it. I made a vow then, to avoid the mental hospital forever. I would try to hide my pain from others, pretend to be fine. Anything to avoid that place. I got a job, worked it for the past year until I fell and broke my ribs. I'm still here. Everything still hurts. I still hate my siblings for the way they treated me, their own little brother. I still hate my sister for driving away my early friends. I still hate my mother, for never being there when I needed her, and for being a narcissistic sociopath. I still hate those that bullied me for so long. Their names and faces are lost to me but their deeds still digging in. I still hate that I never realized how loved I truly was. I still hate everything, and everyone. I love everyone, too. I don't ever want to see another person suffering. The world is cruel though, intentionally. Those in power would not be able to create utopia, but they could make the world so much better and equal and fair and kind, if they collectively chose to. I am so tired. So tired. I am only 22 years old, and I feel as if I have lost everything and everyone. I had dreams, once. They changed as the years passed, until my illusions were finally shattered. I have learned. Dreams, and things like hope, only serve to hurt you. If you consistently hope that things will get better, you will be consistently hurt when they do not. Never forget this. If anyone ever tells you that "Things always get better." know that they are one of two things. Either a liar, one who seeks to teach you an untruth, either for good or malicious reasons, or they are delusional. Things don't get better. Never. They only get worse, continuously. Sometimes, it may seem like things are improving. You may doubt these words, think things are finally on their way up. You are wrong. Things only improve in marginal or temporary ways, or as a reaction to something bad occurring. Stay safe, don't hope, don't dream, and certainly don't try. You will only get worse for it, like a divine punishment. I'm still here. I want to die. I want to die so badly. I have not wished to live in so long that I lost sight of why anyone would ever want to live. To live is to suffer, to be hurt over and over and over. There is beauty in life, yes! Love and kindness and nature- animals and plants and fungi of all kinds. Beautiful colors and amazing landscapes. It is incomparable though, to the pain. For every good thing in this world, there must be at least 10 bad. For every pretty bird you see, how many are killed by wild mangy cats we created, or left homeless for deforestation, or simply made extinct? It is hopeless. There is no change or recovery, no way back. If I had my choice, I would have been a miscarriage. No pain, no loss of innocence. Just peace, my mother's heartbeat, and then eternal darkness. Doesn't that sound lovely? I am tired of responsibility, even as simple as chores or simple obligations. Every day I walk home from work, I must force myself to not throw myself in front of a large vehicle. Were I an awful person like my mother, I would have done it long ago. The only reason I do not is because I do not wish to traumatize the driver. They would likely be too weak to end their own life, and thus be trapped with pain as I am. That is the only reason. The promise I made long ago, to live for my father? He, too, has changed. The strong man I once adored has withered into a crippled husk, his chronic pain and many disabilities leaving him in a worse state than I could even imagine. No, he will never be happy, not by any action of mine. If he finds his own happiness somehow, let him have it. I want no part of any of it, of anything at all. I want to be dead. The horrible thoughts that twist through my head repeat themselves, unendingly. I want it to be over. Even sleep is not a respite. There, nightmares and unpleasant memories linger and mix with unwanted fragments of pasts and emotions and smells I had long forgotten about. I want to die. This is not a situation where I hate myself. I was simply dealt a bad hand in life. I hold no ill will towards myself. I do not wish to live anyone else's life either, though. It is too much. I can't take it. Is it that I'm too weak to live in this world, or that maybe there is a happy life for me out there? I don't know. I don't care. I'm so tired. I'm so tired. I want to go home, but nowhere to go back to. All is lost. I'm still here. Every night I daydream of disemboweling myself in the back yard. Sometimes I consider killing my family first, so they won't suffer either. But in the end I never make a decision. I feel like I'm going to snap somehow, to go absolutely mad if I have to endure these ruminating thoughts and memories any more. I miss my dog. I'm typing through tears, and I'm sure none of this even makes sense, but it's how I feel. It's what I think about every single day. I'm so tired. Yes, I am on medication. Yes, I have a therapist. Neither helps. If you made it this far, thank you. I'm sorry.#Suicidal_intention

I realize that I tend to manipulate and hurt those I am close to, to get what I want. I have never been able to reach the expectations that people set for me, no matter how hard I tried. Whether it be in academics, gaming, sports, or just even as a person; I was never able to achieve that sense of fulfillment. When I got into high school, I thought maybe I would reinvent myself and change how people saw me. This worked. For a little while though. In the 10th grade, things were going well for a while until they did not. There was a whole lot of drama that occurred that I won’t go into detail about, but long story short, I lost many friends and felt alone and like I was a terrible person. By my junior year, I was not invited to any parties or any social events, I had basically no friends, except for the ones I had in my classes that I occasionally talked to. Not only that, I also enrolled in Running Start full time to get away from my high school but that only worsened my depression. I was a 3 - 4 student all throughout my middle school career and my high school career as well, up until that point. I was so depressed that I wouldn’t have the social energy to talk to people or study or do anything for that matter. I got good at putting up a façade so that people around me didn’t know I was depressed. This brings me to my senior year, I had no friends at this point and due to my poor performance in my junior and senior year, I got waitlisted to the only school that I imagined going to: The University of. I eventually got in, but I was a wreck when I didn’t. Moreover, I had a lot of problems socializing, especially with girls I was interested in. They would typically reject me, and I’d respond in sort of a gaslighting fashion, I now realize. Because of my lack of self confidence due to all of these factors, I was very sexually and romantically depressed and I got desperate; searching for ways to date on the internet or sliding into the DMs of girls I knew or had mutual friends with. These attempts would all crash and burn as I was not good at it. Many girls would find me creepy as I had very direct approaches when it came to sexual things. This led me to hate myself further. In my freshman year of college, I turned to dating apps and to social medias of fellow classmates to try and find a romantic relationship. None of these would yield any dates as well. With COVID-19 and school becoming overwhelmingly stressful and I developed severe depression and had many anxiety attacks every day. I eventually went to see a therapist as well as a psychiatrist and I started recovering over time. But doing this also got me a diagnosis of bipolar disorder. Over the summer after my freshman year, I discovered that there was an NSFW side of Twitter. I then joined and met this one girl who I really liked, she won’t be named, but we eventually began dating on the 1st of September 2020. Our long-distance relationship was going pretty well, but we had some bumps mainly due to my mental health issues, which caused us to take a break. Even though we were on a break, we were still basically dating. Around the end of January, I was going through a lot of things, including school, health, and family. I told her about what was going on and she seemed accepting of it. She became distant and I confronted her. She told me she didn’t want to be around me, and she told me that she met someone new, and we basically stopped talking. I realize now that I was manipulative and may have gaslighted her and that is on me. When we broke up, I didn’t know how to handle it so I tried to contact her many different times to try and patch things up and she basically blocked me and rejected my attempts. I became very sad and as an attempt to console myself, I began looking to different online forums such as Discord servers and I did meet someone I actually really liked though they lived in another continent from me. I began to feel better, but things would not stay that way. My great grandmother passed away who is very dear to me and my family, so that hurt a lot. Being around death and sadness just makes you think about all the things you’ve done and how and when you will die. That passed and I began feeling better, but then my uncle, which was my dad’s best friend growing up, passed away suddenly. This prompted me to try and get back with my ex and she shot me down in a major way that hurt me a lot. I forgot to mention that I vented to people who I considered my friends about my breakup. I felt that my ex cheated on me, and that hurt me a lot. One of my friends talked to her about it and made me feel that it was all my fault, which I didn’t feel was true, but I still believed it. With all of this stuff going on; doing poorly in school, losing friends and relationships, and people dying around me, I began to reconsider my life and what it is really worth. This is what led me to this moment, writing this specific note. I have decided to end my life because I can’t endure any more of this suffering and pain, as well as pain I inflict on others. I decided that the best course of action is to kill myself, and end all of this. Goodbye, to those I knew, and to those who knew me. With much love#Suicidal_intention

column1: I can no longer bear the emotional burden of everyday life. Everyday is a bad day. I no longer feel any emotional stability at home. I'm constantly being dragged on a rollercoaster that is spiralling out of control. My parents argue everyday constantly. I always feel afraid; I am walking on eggshells. The tiniest crack and suddenly I get screamed abuse at. I'm always brought into arguments and even if I don't agree with something, I'm forced to side with one over the other. I feel strained, emotionally and physically. I could no longer bare the constant stress. I hate my life. Not because I lack clothes or objects, but because I don't have any emotional support from my parents whatsoever. I can't even tell someone, even my best friend Grace, because If I do, it will only end up even worse. I would bare it until I'm 18, it's only 4 more years, but I would be stupid to think I will be allowed to achieve my dreams. My father is forcing me to leave school early, skip university and to get an apprenticeship to become a chartered accountant. Not only that, but to do it through my auntie (his sister). I hate the whole idea, but in the end, I know there's no way out. For the rest of my life, he'll control everything. I'm going to hate it and one day I'm going to end it. So why not just end it now? Why go through all that pain and hopelessness everyday, when I can just end it now? I would rather not live any life than a life I hate. I'm sorry if you still don't understand why I did this. Maybe one day you'll understand why I did what I did. Maybe not. All that matters, is that I know why I did it. There was only one exit out. I just walked through the door. If I thought you would change, I would've told you everything. This was not a rushed decision. I've been thinking this for years. Bye Grace. I truly loved you like a sister. I'm sorry I didn't tell you everything. Just know, there was nothing you could do so never feel bad. Goodbye. It doesn't matter how far I travel from your lives, just know that I will always love you. We were the right people, we just met at the wrong time. Goodbye #Suicidal_intention
